One of my favorite games at one point. They ruined the matchmaking for ranked years ago in my opinion and the games direction is not what I saw years ago. I stick to source now when i want some CS

Got falsely VAC banned on a game i spent countless number of hours on and spent large amounts of money. CSGO is a game i will always still play to this day but there needs to be better ways on determined if a person is in fact cheating. People who are blatant should suffer the full punishment but those who get butt hurt and report others for small things like pre-fires and using sound should be looked at off of their previous games and not one where they get lucky. 
 Thank you V/R
